prompt: Product captured mid-air frozen in time with automatically generated particles that match the product category and usage. The AI will analyze the uploaded product photo to determine if it's food, electronics, furniture, apparel, cosmetics, tools, books, sports equipment, or other product category. Category-appropriate particles will then explode outward in a dynamic pattern, never in front of the item. The particles will be color-coordinated and contextually relevant to the specific product (e.g., food ingredients for food products, electronic components for electronics, fabric threads for apparel, wood splinters for furniture, cosmetic powder for beauty products, etc.). The background seamlessly matches the product category - food gets kitchen/restaurant environments, electronics get tech showroom settings, furniture gets home interior backgrounds, apparel gets fashion boutique environments, cosmetics get beauty salon settings, tools get workshop backgrounds, books get library/study environments, sports equipment gets gym/field settings. Smart particle analysis creates perfect visual harmony between product, scattered elements, and category-appropriate environment. The mood is dynamic, intelligent, and perfectly matched. High-speed photography with adaptive category particles, frozen motion, intelligent lighting, seamless product-category integration, 8K, smart product photography.
